text: mae hong son best khao in thailand, bamboo bridge and poison coffee
it is a new day
which means a new cup of coffee has to be brewed for me and sacha
and weve got quite an interesting setup here. have you ever seen one of these before
if you have
have you ever seen it cooked in a propane tank sticking in a draw coz we havent
we are brewing some fresh coffee straight on the burner
so how it works is you put water in the bottom
water in the bottom section

coffee in a filter in center and its
steams through
into the top pot and makes a fresh cup of coffee, put it in your cup
it says to keep the flame low but it seems to be taking ages to brew
coz ive never used this before i dont know how long im supposed to wait
getting a bit impatient for my coffee
edens been turfed out of the room
im not sure if im doing this right, i made the coffee i had the heat on way too low
now its up high its just kind of splashed all over my t shirt
you can see the coffee stains
so im gonna have to wash that off
it's done
ok, moment of truth
i had to watch a youtube video to make sure i was doing it right
erghhh
way too strong
i think i put too many coffees in
yeah thats deadly
thats like poison
it is very strong
it kinda tastes like
i dont know, i dont like it
lets go and get a proper coffee
were going to try out Son &mom for breakfast
we are ordering breakfast
oh my word look size at that foam
sacha is a foam lover
so this is heaven
i would love to just make a cup of foam
yeah, a full cup of foam please
hold the coffee
homemade roll
just going to check to see if our favorite restaurant is open for later
im having a nice time so far
its really peaceful in this town
today were going to go outside and head to the outer areas of mae hong son
oooo you sneezing because of the burning
eden sacha and i are at the su tong pae bamboo bridge in mae hong son
which would be beautiful
this is the craziest amount of burnt ash in the air weve ever smelt
were not gonna spend long here, we might come back
having a change of plans today
we were going to come here and then drive another 40km
to some more places
but is so horrible out today

this is the first time my whole time in
Thailand where ive said

it's too much burning, so were not gonna go too
far

just gonna take a quick glance at the
bridges see what it

should be like and then hopefully the
weather will clear up another date for
us to do outdoor activities
according to the last place we were in, mae hong son is the worst place to be in the first 2 weeks of march
so theres a bit of guidence for you
early observations
watch your step
that could be a broken ankle

mother how are your burmese reading
skills

tell me what this says and write in the
comments below
so this is far as we're gonna go for now

the view has been obscured by burning and
my eyes starting to itch
so were gonna head back, such a shame man, this looks really nice
time to go to salween
our favorite place to go get food. lets see if theyve got some nice burmese treats in there
feels good to be back in salween
i got western food this time, ill get my burmese food later

burmese potato cakes very good good
stuff
my mum and dad came here last time, and they were like ohhhh the food

in my opinion this restaurant serves the
best khao soi in the whole of Thailand
its only 50 baht and its really creamy
but i think khao soi is a bit like pizza
everyones got their own preference to how they like it
and we like it creamy and thick, just feels more substantial
love this place
sachas checking out the books
how'd that get here?
i am pleased with my choice
and sacha is jealous
youll be jealous when mine comes
when sachas khao soi comes ill be jealous
sachas khao soi has arrived now, it looks amazing
shallots, coriander pickled vegetables, lime
its the best place ive ever had a khao soi, its delicious
wow that was
unbelievable food, unbelievable food
definitely my favorite place to eat in the whole of mae hong son
yes, i agree, my khao soi was amazing
best
now were just walking the streets, heading to a coffee shop
we went to before but there was a power cut, so we didnt get to try out their real coffees
we have arrived at coffee morning
looks rather trendy
its one of those sweaty humid days, so im sitting right under the fan
taking it easy
got myself a hot drink though, not wise
i like this place, it reminds me of an old library

its good, i like it

but

vines growning on lamposts
all these old benches

probably not the safest bridge in the world
not sure when the last person crossed this thing was
i decided not to walk across it, it looks really ropey
but from here it looks pretty cool
houses in the distance, thats the temple on the hill up there
nice view over there with the palm trees
i enjoyed that

we probably chose the worst time of the year to visit mae hong son
due to the burning season.  we didn't realize it would be that bad
its the worse that weve ever seen it in our 3 years of living here
if you are wanting to go to mae hong son, avoid march i would suggest
its normally beautiful and green
and stunning , we didnt get to see any of it
